content:
# I've successfully crafted 2 stone furnaces and moved back to the origin (0, 0).
# My current inventory now includes:
# - 2 stone furnaces
# - 10 coal
# - 10 stone
# - 30 iron ore

# Now, I will place the first stone furnace at coordinates (1, 0).
first_furnace = place_entity(stone_furnace_prototype, position=Position(x=1, y=0))
print(f"Placed first stone furnace at: {first_furnace.position}")

# Next, I will place the second stone furnace next to the first one at (2, 0).
second_furnace = place_entity_next_to(stone_furnace_prototype, reference_position=first_furnace.position, direction=Direction.RIGHT)
print(f"Placed second stone furnace at: {second_furnace.position}")

# After placing the furnaces, I will insert coal into each furnace to fuel them.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, first_furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert fuel into the first furnace
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, second_furnace, quantity=5) # Insert fuel into the second furnace

# Now I can also insert stone into the first furnace to begin the smelting process into stone bricks.
insert_item(Prototype.Stone, first_furnace, quantity=10)  

print(f"Stone has been inserted into the furnaces for smelting into stone bricks.")
